column3: Latest;Kep: A Chinese man was found dead in a guesthouse in Kep. Authorities claim that it was caused by a “leak in the stomach” (*perforated ulcer?)  due to excessive drinking.------The body was found at 9:30 am on December 10
column7: Kep Province.------Police sources said that the deceased Chinese had no identification
column8: but was about 40 years old.------The body was stored at Kep Hospital.
